history.proof: intros x m M H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. unfold Rmax, Rabs. destruct (Rle_dec M (- m)). - apply Rabs_def1. + srun best use: Rge_gt_trans, Rle_ge, Rlt_gt unfold: Rgt. + scongruence use: Ropp_involutive. - apply Rabs_lt_between. split. + hauto depth: 6 lq: on use: Rge_le, Rlt_le, Rnot_le_lt, Ropp_involutive, Rle_trans, Ropp_le_ge_contravar. + apply H2.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x m M H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. unfold Rmax, Rabs. destruct (Rle_dec M (- m)). - apply Rabs_def1. apply H1. apply Rmax_l. apply H2. - apply Rabs_lt_between. split. + apply Rmax_Rlt in n. destruct n. apply H. + apply H2.
